org.dei.whynot

Class DroolsWithWhyNot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dei.whynot.DroolsWithWhyNot

  • public class DroolsWithWhyNot
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class for managing Drools sessions with "Why Not" explanations.
